extendedInfo.description: In World Conqueror II you will be a general to accomplish a lot of important campaigns during World War II and Cold War. You can fight with or against those famous generals including Guderian, Rommel, Patton, Zhukov, Nimitz, MacArthur, Yamamoto, Montgomery and de Gaulle. Itâs so impressive to see their unique tactics and ace forces. Patton and Rommel are well-known for their panzer corps, Nimitz and Yamamoto for their aircraft carrier fleets while Goering and MacArthur for their air forces â all of them are one and only. Itâs your choice to be a part of the Axis or Allies in WWII, but only after that can Cold War scenarios be unlocked. As campaigns go on, different equipments of each nation would come on the stage. Germanyâs Tiger Tank and the Sovietsâ Katyusha Rocket are two of the most powerful weapons, to name but a few. The army can use various supporting tactics including entrenchments, radars, land forts and anti-aircraft guns for more defenses. The navy may get effective marine strength through combination of destroyers, cruisers, battleships and aircraft carriers. Air strikes, strategic bombing, airborne forces or devastating nuclear bombs help the air force to destroy hostile defense lines. With more and more achievements during the war, your commander will grow from a soldier to a marshal and acquire kinds of special medals which help boost the effectiveness of your troops in turn. ##Features## - Dozens of scenarios among 4 military groups [World War II] The Axis (1939.9) The Allies (1941.1) [Cold War] WTO (1947.5) NATO (1951.8) - Top 20 greatest generals join the campaigns - 57 military units available - 28 tactical instructions - 34 historical campaigns - 37 countries and over 2000 regions involved in the war - Map zooming - Auto-save - Up to 16 rank levels and 18 Medals of Honor

reviews.title: DON\'T BUY MEDALS!!
reviews.comment: The game is really great but when I bought $10 worth of medals I didn\'t get a single one and the developers haven\'t responded to my email either.  :(
reviews.author: Shady Dominguez

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Its not a scam as that one dude said, finished the game in 20 min. The game play is good but its just an old game no being maintained by the producers. Byw hacked it, so it was easy....
reviews.author: Joshua Federico

reviews.title: WARNING
reviews.comment: Do NOT buy or even use this app. Its a copy of a nother game and it is a scam. Trust me dont buy any thing and walk away from this app or find out the hard way
reviews.author: Kyle Mullen

reviews.title: Needs some fixes but good game.
reviews.comment: I enjoy the game but it could use some tweaks. Either this game or your next type of game like this should have. *Allow your allies to move across your territory. *Being able to have an option to move across allies territory without taking it and to claim it for yourself. *Submarines. *Snipers. Just make it so infantry can fire 2 spaces away.  *Countries should have a unique card. Americans -Bomber. Germans - U-boat. Etc. *Give your allies money, territory and buffs.
reviews.author: Joey Carter

reviews.title: Nice game
reviews.comment: Great job!
reviews.author: Marichelle Constantino

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: This game is so addicting some unrealistic details in the battles but I could care less, although I had to reset my phone and now I get to restart everything, was probably 70-80 percent done the game.
reviews.author: Cylus Collinge

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Really fun game.

reviews.title: So cool
reviews.comment: Ew3 better though.

reviews.title: The A.I. are terrible
reviews.comment: This game would be the great if they  made the A.I smarter, until then dont download this game its unplayable.

reviews.comment: Please make the 2nd level of Allies and Axis easier because its too hard anyway possible please.

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Cool
reviews.author: Dori Janwar

reviews.title: Ugh
reviews.comment: Realism is all I can say seriously land based units could not attack sea based units I killed a battleship with infantry..... Their is a reason for wanting land and sea superiority.... Do some combat research and fix some stuff
reviews.author: Jordan Elder

reviews.title: Thank u
reviews.comment: I love u guys for making this game best strategy game on a phone awesooome
reviews.author: Ahmad Jawad

reviews.title: Somewhat dissapointing
reviews.comment: I was looking forward to a great war strategy game, on a par with what old Panzer General used to be. Alas, this is not it. When infantry ashore can initiate a fight with navy or when Norway for some reason invades Sweden in 1940, that is simply not right
reviews.author: Leon Schneiderman

reviews.title: Rip off.
reviews.comment: Super poor costomer service. I made the mistake of paying them for extra medals.
reviews.author: Jon Chase

reviews.title: Not Quite
reviews.comment: Dont get me wrong, I do like the game. But it just isnt right. Sense when can you load a tank on a transport then shot w/ the tank and destroy a battle ship? Plus cost to income is way off,,you can hardly buy units to fight with. There are many things like this that just are not thought out for game play. Seems like their more interested in getting money to play then making a good Strat Game.
reviews.author: Stephen Campbell

reviews.title: Good value
reviews.comment: This game has taken hours away from my social life this game rocks
reviews.author: Kaleb Linder

reviews.title: Way too tedious
reviews.comment: Not historically accurate and very tedious. Especially naval battles when you endlessly click to move one field at a time...there are so much better games out there.
reviews.author: Martins Nikolajevs

reviews.title: Hard
reviews.comment: I would have rated 5 if it wasent so hard
